definitions.title: n. pr. f.
definitions.body: wife of Abraham (princess);—Sarra: Ge 17:15 (where formal change from [[שָׂרַי]]), v:Ge 17:17, v:Ge 17:19, v:Ge 17:21, Ge 21:1 b, Ge 21:3, Ge 23:1, Ge 23:1, Ge 23:2, Ge 23:2, Ge 23:19, Ge 25:10, Ge 25:12, Ge 49:31 (all P), Ge 18:6 + 9 t. Ge 18, Ge 21:1 a, Ge 21:2 a, Ge 24:36, Ge 24:67 (all J), Ge 20:2, Ge 20:2, Ge 20:14, Ge 20:16, Ge 20:18, Ge 21:6, Ge 21:7, Ge 21:9, Ge 21:12 (all E); as ancestress of Hebrews Is 51:2.
